^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.
This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

BVMEnable.description: This property specifies the Bulk Voltage Modulation (BVM) setting for PSUs.
BVMEnable.longDescription: This property specifies the Bulk Voltage Modulation (BVM) setting for Power Supply Units (PSUs). It can be set to 0 or 1, with a default value of 1. This property applies to Hubble and Lake Austin systems only.

CableAmpLimit.description: This property enables the Power Adapter Cable Support.
CableAmpLimit.longDescription: This property enables the Power Adapter Cable Support, such as for the C19-C14 cable. A value of 0 disables it, while a value greater than 0 enables it for the specified amp limit (e.g., 0Ch = 12 Amps). The default value is 0. This value is read-only and set to 0Ch when a PSU with a specific part number is inserted.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ChassisICLAmps.description: This property specifies the value in milliAmps (mA) to use in Set SPA calculations. Only valid if GridChassisICLEnabled Bit 0 is 1.
ChassisICLAmps.longDescription: This property specifies the value in milliAmps (mA) to use in Set SPA calculations, with a default value of 0. It is only valid if the GridChassisICLEnabled Bit 0 is set to 1. This is a read-only property that can only be set by the Chassis Manager (CM) and applies to Lake Austin only.

Enabled.description: Indicates whether the input current limit is enabled.
Enabled.longDescription: This property specifies whether the input current limit functionality is enabled for the system. When set to true, the system will enforce the input current limit to ensure stability and prevent overcurrent conditions. This property is crucial for maintaining system integrity and preventing potential hardware damage.

GridICLAmps.description: This property specifies the value in milliAmps (mA) to use in Set SPA calculations, with a default value of 0. It is only valid if the GridChassisICLEnabled Bit 0 is set to 1.
GridICLAmps.longDescription: This property specifies the value in milliAmps (mA) to use in Set SPA calculations, with a default value of 0. It is only valid if the GridChassisICLEnabled Bit 0 is set to 1. This is a read-only property that can only be set by the Chassis Manager (CM) and applies to Lake Austin only.

DellEnvironmentMetrics.description: This property shall represent the Oem properties for a EnvironmentMetrics resource.
DellEnvironmentMetrics.longDescription: This property shall represent the Oem properties for a EnvironmentMetrics resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AverageFanPWM.description: Represents average fan speed in PWM.
AverageFanPWM.longDescription: This property shall represent average fan speed in PWM

CMConfiguration.description: This property shall contain Chassis Manager (CM) configuration information for this chassis.
CMConfiguration.longDescription: This property shall contain Chassis Manager (CM) configuration information for this chassis.

CMInputCurrentLimit.description: This property shall contains the chassis input current limit settings of a system.
CMInputCurrentLimit.longDescription: his property shall contains the chassis input current limit settings of a system

InfraPowerWatts.longDescription: This property shall contain the total power, in watt units, for this resource infrastructure`.

PowerLimit.description: This property shall contain power limit status and configuration information for this chassis.
PowerLimit.longDescription: This property shall contain power limit status and configuration information for this chassis.

PowerWatts.longDescription: This property shall contain the total power, in watt units, for this resource. The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Power`.

TemperatureCelsius.longDescription: This property shall contain the temperature, in degrees Celsius units, for this resource. The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Temperature`.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

EmergencyPowerLimitAction.description: This property shall specify emergency action for chassis.
EmergencyPowerLimitAction.longDescription: This property shall specify the emergency action policy for chassis power capping, such as doing nothing, throttling via PROPROCHOT (Processor Hot), throttling via software, or powering off.

EmergencyPowerLimitActionSled.description: This property shall define the emergency action for sled.
EmergencyPowerLimitActionSled.longDescription: This property shall define the emergency action policy for sled power capping, indicating whether to follow chassis policy, throttle via PROCHOT (Processor Hot), throttle via software, or power off.

PowerLimitAction.description: This property specify the action on power limit.
PowerLimitAction.longDescription: This property shall specify the action to take when the power limit is reached, such as throttling via PROCHOT or software mechanisms.

PowerLimitException.description: This property shall define the sled-level power capping exception.
PowerLimitException.longDescription: This property shall define the exception policy for sled-level power capping, indicating whether to follow its own sled-level power capping or chassis-level power capping.

PowerLimitStatus.description: This property shall define the power limiting status for the chassis enclosure.
PowerLimitStatus.longDescription: This property shall define the power limiting status for the chassis enclosure.

SetPowerCappingConfigurations.description: This action set the Power Limiting value for standalone servers, where a user may enter a Power Limiting value of the chassis.
SetPowerCappingConfigurations.longDescription: This action sets the Power Limiting value for standalone servers, where a user may enter a Power Limiting value of the chassis. This command includes Chassis-level Power Capping, Sled-level Power Capping, and Emergency Power Capping

EmergencyPowerLimitAction.description: This parameter specifies the emergency action policy for chassis power capping.
EmergencyPowerLimitAction.longDescription: This parameter specifies the emergency action policy for chassis power capping, such as doing nothing, throttling via PROCHOT, throttling via software, or powering off.

EmergencyPowerLimitActionSled.description: This parameter defines the emergency action policy for sled power capping.
EmergencyPowerLimitActionSled.longDescription: This parameter defines the emergency action policy for sled power capping, indicating whether to follow chassis policy, throttle via PROCHOT, throttle via software, or power off.

PowerLimitAction.description: This parameter specifies the action to take when the power limit is reached.
PowerLimitAction.longDescription: This parameter specifies the action to take when the power limit is reached, such as throttling via PROCHOT or software mechanisms.

PowerLimitException.description: This parameter defines the sled-level power capping exception.
PowerLimitException.longDescription: This parameter defines the exception policy for sled-level power capping, indicating whether to follow its own sled-level power capping or chassis-level power capping.

PowerLimitStatus.description: This parameter defines the power limiting status for the chassis enclosure.
PowerLimitStatus.longDescription: This parameter defines the power limiting status for the chassis enclosure.

PowerLimitValue.description: This parameter specifies the power limiting value in watts.
PowerLimitValue.longDescription: This parameter specifies the power limiting value in watts, with the least significant byte first.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #DellEnvironmentMetrics.v1_2_0
